name: Nudge
description: Collaborated with a team of five to develop Nudge, a motivational workout app that is personalized to users. Promotes staying active and reduces a sedentary lifestyle using data from a smart watch. Designed the introduction and community page for Nudge’s mobile app  as well as the smart watch display using Figma.

name: How do Lakes Iseo, Sammamish, Saimaa, Kallavesi, and Längelmävesi Change Throughout the Years 2002 to 2020?
description: Presented research findings on global lake variable changes using MATLAB. Analyzed data on water and surface temperatures for a selection of lakes across different geographic regions. Utilized MATLAB for data visualization on the changes of temperature between 2002 to 2020.

name: Gene-iuses
description: Developed Python scripts to identify the largest repeating unit within a spider protein sequence and utilized HTML and CSS to showcase similarities between different spider species. Developed the Code Page and About Us page
